scripts.test: node scripts/run-with-log.js test-full.log npm run all
scripts.test:coverage: node scripts/run-with-log.js coverage.log npm run test:coverage:raw
scripts.test:quick: node scripts/run-with-log.js test.log npm run test:raw && npm run docs:status
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run test:quick && npm run play
scripts.start: npm run build && node src/play.js && py c2m.py
scripts.play: node scripts/run-with-log.js play.log npm run play:raw
scripts.verify:overlap:ci: npm run play:raw && npm run verify:overlap
scripts.verify:fast: cross-env PLAY_LIMIT=1 npm run play:raw && npm run verify:unit-tree && npm run verify:layer-alignment && npm run verify:unitMasterMap
scripts.test:ci: npm run play:raw && npm run verify:unit-tree && npm run verify:layer-alignment
